artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 236, horizontal chūban #24.50
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 急ぐとも心してゆけすべりなばあと戻りせん雨の土山　柴の門茶女 {Isogutomo kokoroshite yuke suberinaba ato modori sen ame no Tsuchiyama, ...} (No matter in what hurry you are in, better be careful passing through since Tsuchiyama is always rainy, ...)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi 東海道五十三次), also known as the Kyōka Tōkaidō
title: Tsuchiyama: View of the Suzuka Mountains
